content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "beehive", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 42}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft stripped_spruce_wood, I need to place the stripped_spruce_log at slot 19 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 42}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to place another stripped_spruce_log into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the log from slot 19 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 42}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to place another stripped_spruce_log into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the log from slot 19 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 42}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to place another stripped_spruce_log into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the log from slot 19 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 62, "index": 31}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 42}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_spruce_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
